H

handleCarOrSnakeDeath() - Method in class frogger.model.actor.movableActor.Frog
This method is called by Frog.handleDeath(long) when the Frog.deathType is set to "carSnakeDeath" to handle the corresponding death situation.
handleDeath(long) - Method in class frogger.model.actor.movableActor.Frog
This method is called when Frog touch Obstacle, Snake, Chomper or sunk into pool to handle the death situation.
handleEndTouched(MovableActor) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method is called by Frog when frog enter into terminal point.
handleGameEnd() - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method is called when the remaining life is zero or the endCount is five.
handleHomeButtonPressed() - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
Called when the home Button is clicked and back to the start screen as well as endGame(int)
handleInstructionButtonPressed() - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
Called when the instruction Button is clicked and show the instruction screen
handleKeyPressedEvent(KeyEvent) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method call Frog.moveKeyPressed(String) when player presses a key.
handleKeyReleasedEvent(KeyEvent) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method call Frog.moveKeyReleased(String) when player releases a key.
handleLifeLosed() - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method handle the Life lose situation and remove the corresponding imageView in Map
handleLogTurtleTouched(MovableActor) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method is called by Turtle or Log when they touch Frog.
handleMove(String) - Method in class frogger.model.actor.movableActor.Frog
This method is called when the key pressed and released to let Frog move
handleObstacleSnakeTouched(MovableActor) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method is called by Obstacle or Snake when they touch Frog.
handlePoolChomperTouched(MovableActor) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method is called by WetTurtle or Frog when frog sunk into pool.
handlePopupScoreListChanged(int) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method update the current round popup socre list with given point and called by handleScoreChanged(int).
handleRestartButtonPressed() - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
Called when the restart Button is clicked and restart the game
handleScoreChanged(int) - Method in enum frogger.controller.GameController
This method handle the Score add or subtract based on the given input points and call ScoreBoardUpdater.updateScore(int, java.util.ArrayList) to update scoreBoard view in Map.
handleWaterChomperDeath() - Method in class frogger.model.actor.movableActor.Frog
This method is called by Frog.handleDeath(long) when the Frog.deathType is set to "waterChomperDeath" to handle the corresponding death situation.
HardMode - Class in frogger.constant
HardMode
HardMode() - Constructor for class frogger.constant.HardMode
 
homeButton - Variable in class frogger.view.GameView
The home Button that back to the start screen when clicked
